      • Serialized Fields

        • p

          Point p
          For plotting in the plane. A reference point indicating the position of the corner of the rhomb with even angles that has two outward-pointing arrows.

        • type

          int type
          The congruence class of rhomb. Given by the difference of the angles of its Yarns.

        • angle

          int angle
          Orientation.

        • y1

          Yarn y1
          The first Yarn incident with this point.

        • y2

          Yarn y2
          The second Yarn incident with this point.

        • scale

          double scale
          The scale for drawing the rhomb.

        • vertices

          Point[] vertices
          And the same polygon as a list of Points.

    • Class RhombBoundary extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      5510L

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream stream)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
          Method for saving and restoring.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException
          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        • writeObject

          private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream stream)
                  throws java.io.IOException
          Method for saving and restoring.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

      • Serialized Fields

        • l

          int l
          The number of subedges.

        • n

          int n
          A field for keeping track of the value of Point.N() that was used when this was created. This can be checked against the current value of N during de-serialization to make sure it's consistent.

        • termini

          Terminus[] termini
          The angles of the subedges (a subedge is a Terminus) read in counterclockwise order.

        • yarns

          Yarn[] yarns
          A List of all the Yarns in the pattern.

        • allJoins

          java.util.List<E> allJoins
          All the Joins of all the Yarns in the pattern.

        • edgeJoins

          java.util.List<E> edgeJoins
          All the Joins that have two rhomb edges on the boundary.

        • triples

          java.util.List<E> triples
          All Triples of Yarns that cross each other, with no intervening Yarns in their crossing lists.

        • valid

          boolean valid
          Does this represent a valid tiling with no overlapping rhombs?

    • Class SimpleHex extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      7513L

      • Serialized Fields

        • hex

          SimplePolygon2D hex
          A representation of this as a hexagon.

        • rhombs

          SimpleRhomb[] rhombs
          The three rhombs in this hex.

        • directions

          boolean[] directions
          A set of instructions for flipping the hex. For each rhomb in triple, do we shift it by the positive or the negative of the direction vector common to the two other rhombs?

    • Class SimpleRhomb extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      5607L

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream stream)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
          Method for restoring a saved Join.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException
          java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        • writeObject

          private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream stream)
                  throws java.io.IOException
          Method for saving.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • readObjectNoData

          private void readObjectNoData()
                       throws java.io.ObjectStreamException
          Method for restoring a saved SimpleRhomb. Empty.
          Throws:
          java.io.ObjectStreamException

      • Serialized Fields

        • p

          Point p
          For plotting in the plane. A reference point indicating the position of the corner of the rhomb with even angles that has two outward-pointing arrows.

        • v1

          Point v1
          A vector indicating the first outward-pointing edge from SimpleRhomb.p.

        • v2

          Point v2
          A vector indicating the second outward-pointing edge from SimpleRhomb.p.

        • type

          int type
          The congruence class of rhomb.

        • angle

          int angle
          Orientation.

        • vertices

          Point[] vertices
          The four vertices, represented as integer vectors of length Point.N()-1.

        • scale

          double scale
          The scale for drawing.

        • adjacent

          SimpleRhomb[] adjacent
          The rhombs that share edges in common with this one. This is at most four rhombs. If some edges are on the boundary, we indicate that by putting nulls there. The rhombs that share a v1-edge are listed at positions 0 and 3, the rhombs that share a v2-edge are at 1 and 2. The ones that share an edge of one and lie at the bases of the edges of the other type are listed at 0 and 1.

    • Class SubstitutionEditorSaveState extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      7532L

      • Serialized Fields

        • rules

          java.util.List<E> rules
          A List of patches representing the substituted images of all the supertiles of the saved SubstitutionEditor.

        • edge

          int[] edge
          The edge sequence of the substitution.

        • colours

          java.util.List<E> colours
          The colour scheme to which ColourPalette was set when the SubstitutionEditor was saved.

        • antialiasing

          boolean antialiasing
          A variable telling us if the PatchDisplay of the SubstitutionEditor was set to use antialiasing to draw itself.

        • supertiles

          boolean supertiles
          A variable telling us if the PatchDisplay of the SubstitutionEditor was set to draw supertile outlines.

        • maxSubstitutions

          int maxSubstitutions
          The maximum number of substitutions that were allowed with this SubstitutionEditor.

    • Class Terminus extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      5507L

      • Serialized Fields

        • index

          int index
          The position of this in the big list of termini. This is for outside classes to keep track of termini.

        • angle

          int angle
          The angle of the boundary subedge where this is located.

    • Class Yarn extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      5509L

      • Serialized Fields

        • start

          Terminus start
          The Terminus where this Yarn begins. Should have an even angle.

        • end

          Terminus end
          The Terminus where this Yarn ends. Should have an odd angle if N is even.

        • cross

          java.util.LinkedList<E> cross
          A List of all Yarns that cross this one.

        • joins

          java.util.LinkedList<E> joins
          A List of all crossings.

        • opposite

          Yarn opposite
          The image of this Yarn under a 180-degree rotation of the whole configuration, if there is such a symmetry. Otherwise this is null.
